alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 1:00PM MST until March 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...A mix of light freezing drizzle, light freezing rain and dense freezing fog expected. Ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 8 PM MST /9 PM CST/ this evening to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas not receiving light freezing rain should expect to see light freezing drizzle and dense freezing fog with visibilities at or below one quarter mile. Conditions will rapidly improve from west to east from late Thursday morning through the afternoon as winds shift to the northwest.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
